bio: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy. He's an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. With experience in academia and tech, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. yeehaa advocates for impactful and inclusive internet, having been involved in various tech initiatives. Currently based in Taipei, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems.
